name: Perplexity Search (OpenRouter)
description: Add a Perplexity/OpenRouter-powered search tool that behaves like web_search but returns AI-synthesized answers.

keyFile.description: Path to a file containing an OpenRouter API key (sk-or-...).

baseUrl.description: Base URL for the OpenRouter API (defaults to https://openrouter.ai/api/v1).

maxTokens.description: Max tokens for the Perplexity response (defaults to 1024).
